metadata.name: BESTIE #1/100 #1/100
metadata.description:
"Bestie" is a unique and Vibrant NFT Music Collection 
That Captures The Essence of friendship and the joy of being with your best friend.  
  Each NFT in the Collection Represents a Musical Journey That  
Celebrates the Bond Between Friends, From The Highs To The lows and Everything in Between. 
The Collection Features Original Artwork and Music, all Packaged Together In a One-Of-a-Kind Digital Experience That Music and Art Lovers Alike Will Appreciate. 
With "Bestie," you can own a Piece of Music History That Embodies The Spirit Of Friendship and Reminds Us all of The Joy Of Connecting With Those Closest To Us.

Owning This NFT Grants You Exclusive Access To The Stems, Access To Metaverse events, Private Listening Parties of My Upcoming Projects and Events In The Future 

SHAZAM THIS NFT:  
Search It In Our Favourite Music  Discovery  App 
Save It on your Favourite Streaming  Service 

PUT THIS NFT OM YOUR PLAYLIST:

Available on all Digital platforms Worldwide.
